short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that allows you to download chat conversations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
U can easily download your Chat GPT Chats using this small extension, I will constantly update it if there come chatgpt html updates.

The Chats are downloaded as HTML-Files so u can easily open and view them.

Stylesheet used by this extension is a rip-off of the ChatGPT stylesheet so all rights are onto them.
